name: Rajeev Ranjan
bio: Rajeev brings 12+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and scaling tech startups. He has mentored over 500 developers and is passionate about empowering the next generation of innovators.

name: Nithin Talari
bio: Nithin is a seasoned product manager and startup advisor with a background in EdTech innovation. He specializes in lean product development, UX strategy, and guiding early-stage founders from idea to launch.

name: Sandeep Das
bio: With over 10 years in AI and machine learning, Sandeep has built scalable models for finance, healthcare, and robotics. He actively mentors AI enthusiasts and contributes to open-source research.
